name: XD - Tic Tac
description:
• XD - Tic Tac •

This game will test your reflexes the hard way, despite its simple design. Your ultimate impossible goal is
to keep jumping over incoming enemies. Sounds simple? It's not!

• FEATURES •

- One touch controls
- Control 2 characters at the same time !
- Tap to jump over enemies
- Easy and fun to play, but a challenge to fully master

Jump over enemies to score more points !

- Lots of fun
- Nice graphics
- Addicting gameplay
- Clear and simple UI
What are you waiting for? GET IT NOW!
